21st Annual Wesley Chapel Fall Festival Presented by Pasco County Recycling
THE SHOPS AT WIREGASS
28211 paseo drive
Wesley Chapel ,FL 33543
DATE & TIME
Oct. 25th & 26th, 2025
11:00am ¬†to 6:00pm
Get ready for the North Tampa Bay Chamber's Premier event. The 21st Annual Wesley Chapel Fall Festival returns to The shops at wiregrass and it's been two full decades of family-friendly fun brought to you by the North Tampa Bay Chamber of Commerce!!! With a full carnival, food trucks, kids play zone, pumpkin photo stops, kids activities, Trunk or Treat Sunday, Costume Contests, local bands, community performances, and more! ¬†Over 10,000 patrons visit this event each year. We are seeking sponsors and vendors to support the event and we have more opportunities than ever before.
Contact (727) 510-9343 or
LK@FloridaPenguinProductions.com
for vendor and/or event information.
Business Exhibitors Can Apply Online
Vendor Application
Follow us on Facebook
2025 Sarasota Fall Festival & Carnival
The Mall at University Town Center
140 University Town Center Dr.
Sarasota, FL 34243
DATE & TIME
Oct. 31st to Nov. 2nd
Friday 5:00pm - 11:00pm
Saturday 11:00am - 11:00pm
Sunday 11:00am - 8:00pm
(Extended Dates & Times for Carnival TBA visit
www.dreamlandamusements.com
for the latest info)
It's everyone's favorite time of year with the beautiful Fall Weather and holidays approaching! ¬†Join us for our largest event at UTC Mall with thousands of families in attendance through the weekend. ¬†Including carnival rides offering thrills & fun for all ages, fall themed photo stops, stage performances, and the best food trucks and vendors from across Florida. This event is the one you've been waiting for! ¬†Sign up today before all our spooky spaces and sponsorship opportunities vanish!
Contact (727) 674-1464 or
KEVIN@FloridaPenguinProductions.com
for vendor and/or event information.

Suncoast Largest Food Truck Festival 8
As part of UTC's annual "Santa's Grand Arrival Parade"
Date: Saturday, November 8th, 2025
Time: 11 AM ‚Äì 8 PM
Location: The Mall at University Town Center
Address: 140 University Town Center Dr, Sarasota, FL 34243
Number of Food Vendors: 30+
Free Entry & Free Parking for Patrons
Food Vendor Fee: Starts at $250-$300
Extra Step at this Event:¬†Food Vendors must call the Sarasota County Fire Prevention office at 941-861-2290 to set up their food truck inspection before event day.

for questions on menu availability and event logistics. ¬†Click the link below to submit a vendor application.

Follow us on Facebook
Sabor Latino - Latin Music & Food Fest
Zephyrhills Community Venue
5200 Airport Rd. , Zephyrhills, FL 33542
DATE & TIME
November 15th, 2025
12:00pm ¬†to 6:00pm
$10 Entry 18+
Get ready for a sizzling celebration of Latin culture at the ¬°Sabor Latino! - Latin Music Festival, returning for year 2 in Zephyrhills on November 15th, 2025! Immerse yourself in the rhythmic beats, savory flavors, and electrifying energy that define the essence of Latin America.
Latin Music Extravaganza: Let the intoxicating melodies transport you to the heart of Latin rhythm! The festival will feature a diverse lineup of talented musicians taking you on an unforgettable musical journey that spans salsa, merengue, bachata, reggaet√≥n, and more.
Savor the Flavor: Treat your taste buds to an explosion of Latin flavors with a tempting array of authentic dishes. From Argentinian to Mexican to Puerto Rican, our food vendors will delight your senses with the best in Latin cuisine.
Dance the Night Away: Lace up your dancing shoes and hit the dance floor! Join in the festivities as both professional dancers and enthusiasts showcase their moves, and don't miss the chance to learn some Latin dance steps yourself. The beats are contagious, and the dance floor is calling!
Live Bands and DJs: Experience the thrill of live performances by talented Latin bands that will keep you on your feet. Feel the passion and energy as each band takes the stage, creating an atmosphere of celebration and unity.
Fun for All Ages: This is not just a festival; it's a family-friendly fiesta! With activities for kids, delicious treats for all ages, and a lively atmosphere, the ¬°Sabor Latino! festival promises an unforgettable day of joy and connections for everyone.
Save the date - Nov 15th, 2025 - and join us in Zephyrhills for a spectacular fusion of music, dance, and culinary delights at the ¬°Sabor Latino! - Latin Music Festival. Let's create memories together in a celebration of diversity and unity!
For more information on how to get your business involved as a sponsor or vendor, please email
lk@floridapenguinproductions.com
or call 727-510-9343 for more information.

4424 Friendly Way,

With special introductory pricing for our grand opening, contact
brett@floridapenguinproductions.com
for more information. ¬†¬†Featuring 75+ vendors ¬†this market is sure to be a staple event for the huge community in and near Avalon Park!

Friday Moonlight Market at The Hub at Bexley
Date:
2nd & 4th Fridays
Time:
5pm-9pm
THE HUB AT BEXLEY
16954 Focus Loop
Land O' Lakes, FL 34638
Our exciting Friday Night Market in the heart of Land O Lakes off HWY 54 and Memorial Highway has been an incredible success. ¬†We would love to speak with you about your business getting involved with our latest Friday Night event!
Food Trucks are unable to attend.
We are seeking night-friendly vendors with unique items, activities, and community sponsors.
To get your business involved, click this link below.
2025 Vendor Application

Harvest Markets at The Grove at Wesley Chapel (2nd & 4th Sundays)
Date: ¬†2nd & 4th Sundays of the Year | Sept '25 - May '26
Time: 11am-3pm
The Grove at Wesley Chapel & The Krate
Wesley Grove Blvd
Wesley Chapel, FL 33544
Join our favorite shopping experience at one of the busiest shopping centers in Wesley Chapel every 2nd & 4th Sunday.
Our vendor registration linked below gives each vendor a chance to register online for multiple dates all at once. Pricing starts at just $25-$150. However, limitations may apply. ¬†Please call us at 727-483-1630 and speak with Brett Cecere about this event, or email him at
brett@floridapenguinproductions.com
before registering for this event.
No Food Trucks
are accepted at this venue but we have many large food truck rallies that may be a good fit.
2025-2026 Vendor/Business Application Form
FREE RSVP ON FACEBOOK
Corey Ave Sunday Fresh Market on St. Pete Beach
2025 Vendor Applications Open
Date: Every Sunday Morning Year Round
Time: ¬†¬†10am -2pm Sundays
9:00am to 1:00pm (Summer Hours)
Corey Avenue Shopping District
300-421 Corey Avenue
St Pete Beach, FL 33706
We are very excited to be part of the long-standing and extremely successful Corey Ave Sunday Fresh Market on St. Pete Beach. ¬†This event has strict guidelines and policies, and we have a pre-registration review process. ¬†All handmade crafters & cottage bakers are welcome to pre-register. ¬†Please call us at 727-415-6969 to speak with Blaise Bullard about this event or reach out by email at
markets@floridapenguinproductions.com
. ¬†¬†We would love to speak with you about your business getting involved with the weekly Corey Ave Sunday Fresh market.
Food Truck involvement is very limited and you must have LP Gas Leak Certification per St. Pete Beach statutes.
To get your business involved, click this link below.
2025 Vendor Application
Once your profile is submitted with your requested dates you will be notified if your business is approved, and for which dates can be confirmed. Billing is done 2 weeks before each Sunday. New vendors may be waitlisted but we fill all empty spaces with waitlisted vendors each week.
Already Registered Your Profile on Marketwurks?
Click this link
to view your profile, add new dates for approval, or make any adjustments.. ¬†Contact markets @floridapenguinproductions.com for questions.
2025/2026 Facebook Event Page (Please RSVP & Follow)
Handmade Crafters, Cottage Bakers & Produce Vendors
Receive our event notification emails to get the first updates when new events are opened for new vendors. ¬†Check out our list of available Markets & Festivals below.
